<h1><p align="center">Instructions to Ð¡onfigure Local Environment</p></h1>
<br>
<h3><p align="center">Get Source Code</p></h3><br>
<ol>
<li>Install TortoiseSVN(from http://sourceforge.net/projects/tortoisesvn/)</li>
<li>Create folder in local hard disk(for example "Taksopark")</li>
<li>Pull the last version of the project from https://taksopark.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ into the created folder</li>
</ol>
<p></p>
<h3><p align="center">Deploy the Database</p></h3><br>
<p></p>
* You don't need to deploy the database localy on your PC as it's already located on the server side and connection string is inserted in Web.config files. But if you still need to deploy it - use the below instructions:
<ol>
<li>Install SQL Server Express 2008/2012/2014</li>
<li>Install Microsoft SQL Server and SQL Management Studio 2008/2012/2014</li>

<li>Execute the script https://taksopark.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/DBQuery/CreateDB.sql</li>
</ol>
<h3><p align="center">Run the System</p></h3><br>
<p></p>
<ol>
<li>Install Microsoft Visual Studio 2012/2013(Express for Web is enought)</li>
<li>Open the solution Taksopark.sln</li>
<li>Change connection string in the Web.config of the project "Taksopark.MVC"</li>
<li>Change connection string in the Web.config of the project "Taksopark.WebForms"</li> 
<li>The projects "Taksopark.MVC" and "Taksopark.WebForms" are ready to run</li>
</ol>
